modName: Real Clear Map - for rpg lovers
summary: This mod is a simply editting of icons. In your map, there will be no icon. So you have to actually know the Skyrim's map and the places.
descriptionHtml:
[b]What this mod does?[/b]
Actually this mod is an simple edit of "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10093/?]Map Hud Enhanced[/url]" mod. My editting is just changing the map icons with blank images. I think it is more rpg like map. This mod is not removing the player icon and quest icon. So you can see where you are and where the quest is.


[b]What this mod does not?[/b]
*Not removing the place names on the map. So when you get your mouse on the "Whiterun" below the mouse icon, there will be "Whiterun" text. (see images and video)

*Not disabling the fast travel. If you are real rpg lover you already have it, right?

OPTIONAL: Clear compass, (in files, option1) with this, your compass will clear as map. The directions, quest icons and custom icons will be shown on your compass.


[youtube]936TDRfQ0QI[/youtube]




[b]Compatibility
[/b]
This mod is [b]compatible[/b] with

A Quality World Map and Solstheim Map - With Roads
World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders 
Skyrim topographic map 
(NOT tested) Follower Map Markers

[b]
This mod is [u]not[/u] compatible with[/b]
EzEs -Colored Map Markers- by xEightballx 
Colored Map Markers Updated by MisterPete Forsaken32 Mardoxx 
Not Another Colored Map Icon Mod - NACMIM

and everything changing the map.swf


Credits

by IceKK for creating map hud enhanced mod
and me for editting
author: Ismetisgor
